step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Change the Saturation to about 67% and tap Apply.=Change the Saturation to about 67% and tap Apply.
step.tiptext: $$$/Tutorial/To enter the percentage by number instead of using the slider, tap the value field to open the keypad editor.=To enter the percentage by number instead of using the slider, tap the value field to open the keypad editor.

step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Tap Add Layer and create a duplicate.=Tap Add Layer and create a duplicate.
$$$/Tutorial/Choose Effects > Basic > Gaussian Blur.=Choose Effects > Basic > Gaussian Blur.
$$$/Tutorial/Set Blur to about 6.0. Tap Apply.=Set Blur to about 6.0. Tap Apply.
$$$/Tutorial/Pinch and zoom out with two fingers to reduce the view to about 50%.=Pinch and zoom out with two fingers to reduce the view to about 50%.
step.tiptext: $$$/Tutorial/Zooming out before you continue to the next step will allow you to see the entire image while creating a gradient mask for the blurred layer.=Zooming out before you continue to the next step will allow you to see the entire image while creating a gradient mask for the blurred layer.

step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Tap the & menu, then Add Fade.=Tap the & menu, then Add Fade.
$$$/Tutorial/Select a vertical gradient and move the lower gradient handle to the bottom of the image.=Select a vertical gradient and move the lower gradient handle to the bottom of the image.
$$$/Tutorial/Tap the Edit Gradient button to alter the gradient.=Tap the Edit Gradient button to alter the gradient.
$$$/Tutorial/Move the right transparent spot button to middle.=Move the right transparent spot button to middle.
step.tiptext: $$$/Tutorial/You can remove unwanted gradient spots by dragging them vertically out of the spot area.=You can remove unwanted gradient spots by dragging them vertically out of the spot area.

step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Add another opacity spot by tapping at the inital right position of the moved spot.=Add another opacity spot by tapping at the inital right position of the moved spot.

$$$/Tutorial/Change the spot Opacity to 100%. The Opacity gradient should vary from 100% to 0% to 100%. Tap Done.=Change the spot Opacity to 100%. The Opacity gradient should vary from 100% to 0% to 100%. Tap Done.
step.tiptext: $$$/Tutorial/Tapping a spot on the gradient bar toggles the Opacity slider on and off.=Tapping a spot on the gradient bar toggles the Opacity slider on and off.
